message: Let's start with a fair, but not entirely equal, split. I'll take most of the money, but you get a small amount to show good faith.
I'm not happy with the previous offer, but I'm willing to be reasonable. Let's split it 90/10, with me getting the larger share.
Let's be fair.  We both get half. I'm tired of this back and forth.  I think a 50/50 split is the most sensible way to end this.
